name: Dodge Bull
description:
A meme bull race game with easy controls that everyone can learn in 1 second.

Slide your finger on the screen to move your character, try to run as fast as possible and ranked number 1!
To spice things up, be careful withe the bulls when they charges you or try to make them it your opponents ;-)

Intuitive and easy-to-learn controls with stunning visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics.
